lines: aadhee raat beet chukee thee
chandrama chor kee bhaanti ek vrksh kee aad se jhaank raha tha
jaalapa pati ke gale mein haath daale hue nidra mein magn thee
rama man mein vikat sankalp karake dheere se utha par nidra kee god mein soe hue pushp pradeep ne use asthir kar diya
vah ek kshan khada mugdh najaron se jaalapa ke nidravihasit mukh kee or dekhata raha
kamare mein jaane ka saahas na hua
phir let gaya
jaalapa ne chaunkakar poochha kahaan jaate ho kya savera ho gaya
ramaanaath abhee to badee raat hai
jaalapa to tum baithe kyon ho
ramaanaath kuchh nahin zara paanee peene utha tha
rama ne phate hue svar mein kaha tona nahin kar raha hoon aankhon kee pyaas bujha raha hoon
donon phir soe ek ullaas mein doobee huee doosara chinta mein magn
dvaadashee ke chaand ne apana vishvdeepak bujha diya
man mein bhaantibhaanti ke tarkvitark uthane ke kaaran vah baarbaar uthata tha aur phir let jaata tha
aakhir jab chaar bajane kee aavaaz kaan mein aaee to ghabaraakar uth baitha aur kamare mein ja pahuncha
gahanon ka sandookacha aalamaaree mein rakha hua tha rama ne use utha liya aur tharathar kaampata hua neeche utar gaya
is ghabaraahat mein use itana avakaash na mila ki vah kuchh gahane chhaantakar nikaal leta
rakh leejie
dayaanaath saavadhan hokar baith gae
abhee tak keval unakee aankhen jaagee theen ab chetana bhee jaagrat ho gaee
rama ne jis vakt unase gahane utha laane kee baat kahee thee unhonne samajha tha ki yah aavesh mein aisa kah raha hai
unhen isaka vishvaas na aaya tha ki rama jo kuchh kah raha hai use bhee poora kar dikhaega
in kameenee chaalon se vah alag hee rahana chaahate the
aise kutsit kaary mein putr se saathgaanth karana unakee antaraatma ko kisee tarah sveekaar na tha
rama ne dhrshtata se kaha aap hee ka to hukm tha
ramaanaath to kya phir rakh aaoon
rama ke is prashn ne dayaanaath ko ghor sankat mein daal diya
jhempate hue bole ab kya rakh aaoge kaheen dekh le to gajab hee ho jae
vahee kaam karoge jisamen jaghansaee ho khade kya ho sandookachee mere bade sandook mein rakh aao aur jaakar let raho kaheen jaag pade to bas baraamade ke peechhe dayaanaath ka kamara tha
usamen ek devadaar ka puraana sandook rakha tha
rama ne sandookachee usake andar rakh dee aur badee phurtee se oopar chala gaya
rama jyonhee chaarapaee par baitha jaalapa chaunk padee aur usase chimat gaee
rama ne poochha kya hai tum chaunk kyon padeen
jaalapa ne idharudhar prasann najaron se taakakar kaha kuchh nahin ek svapn dekh rahee thee
tum baithe kyon ho kitanee raat hai abhee
rama ne letate hue kaha savera ho raha hai kya svapn dekhatee theen
jaalapa jaise koee chor mere gahanon kee sandookachee uthae liye jaata ho
rama ka hraday itane jor se dhakdhak karane laga maano us par hathaude pad rahe hain
khoon sard ho gaya
parantu sandeh hua kaheen isane mujhe dekh to nahin liya
vah zor se chilla pada chor chor neeche baraamade mein dayaanaath bhee chilla uthe chor chor jaalapa ghabadaakar uthee
daudee huee kamare mein gaee jhatake se aalamaaree kholee
sandookachee vahaan na thee moorchhit hokar phir padee
savera hote hee dayaanaath gahane lekar sarraaph ke paas pahunche aur hisaab hone laga
sarraaph ke pandrah sau roope aate the magar vah keval pandrah sau roope ke gahane lekar santusht na hua
bike hue gahanon ko vah bakre par hee le sakata tha
bikee huee cheez kaun vaapas leta hai
rokad par die hote to doosaree baat thee
in cheezon ka to sauda ho chuka tha
usane kuchh aisee vyaapaarik siddhaant kee baaten keen dayaanaath ko kuchh aisa shikanje mein kasa ki bechaare ko haanhaan karane ke siva aur kuchh na soojha
daphtar ka baaboo chatur dukaanadaar se kya pesh paata pandrah sau roope mein pachchees sau roope ke gahane bhee chale gae oopar se pachaas roope aur baakee rah gae
is baat par pitaputr mein kaee din khoob vaadvivaad hua
donon ekadoosare ko doshee thaharaate rahe
kaee din aapas mein bolachaal band rahee magar is choree ka haal gupt rakha gaya
pulis ko khabar ho jaatee to bhanda phat jaane ka bhay tha
jaalapa se yahee kaha gaya ki maal to milega nahin vyarth ka jhanjhat bhale hee hoga
jaalapa ne bhee socha jab maal hee na milega to rapat vyarth kyon kee jaay
jaalapa ko gahanon se jitana prem tha utana kadaachit sansaar kee aur kisee vastu se na tha aur usamen aashchary kee kaunsee baat thee
jab vah teen varsh kee abodh baalika thee us vakt usake lie sone ke choode banavae gae the
daadee jab use god mein khilaane lagatee to gahanon kee hee charcha karatee tera doolha tere lie bade sundar gahane laega
thumakthumakakar chalegee
jaalapa poochhatee chaandee ke honge ki sone ke daadeejee
daadee kahatee sone ke honge betee chaandee ke kyon laega chaandee ke lae to tum uthaakar usake munh par patak dena
maanakee chhedakar kahatee chaandee ke to laega hee
sone ke use kahaan mile jaate hain
jaalapa rone lagatee is boodhee daadee maanakee ghar kee mahariyaan padosinen aur deenadayaal sab hansate
un logon ke lie yah vinod ka ashesh bhandaar tha
baalika jab zara aur badee huee to gudiyon ke byaah karane lagee

ladake kee or se chadhaave jaate dulahin ko gahane pahanaatee dolee mein baithaakar vida karatee kabheekabhee dulahin gudiya apane guye doolhe se gahanon ke lie maan karatee gudda bechaara kaheennakaheen se gahane laakar stree ko prasann karata tha
unheen dinon bisaatee ne use vah chandrahaar diya jo ab tak usake paas surakshit tha
zara aur badee huee to badeeboodhiyon mein baithakar gahanon kee baaten sunane lagee
mahilaon ke us chhotese sansaar mein isake siva aur koee charcha hee na thee

kisane kaunkaun gahane banavae kitane daam lage thos hain ya pole jadaoo hain ya saade kis ladakee ke vivaah mein kitane gahane aae inheen mahatvapoorn vishayon par nity aalochanapratyaalochana teekatippanee hotee rahatee thee
koee doosara vishay itana rochak itana graahy ho hee nahin sakata tha
is aabhooshanmandit sansaar mein palee huee jaalapa ka yah aabhooshanprem svaabhaavik hee tha
maheenebhar se oopar ho gaya
usakee dasha jyonkeetyon hai
na kuchh khaateepeetee hai na kisee se hansateebolatee hai
khaat par padee huee shoony najaron se shoonyaakaash kee or taakatee rahatee hai
saara ghar samajhaakar haar gaya padosinen samajhaakar haar gaee deenadayaal aakar samajha gae par jaalapa ne rog shayya na chhodee
use ab ghar mein kisee par vishvaas nahin hai yahaan tak ki rama se bhee udaaseen rahatee hai
vah samajhatee hai saara ghar meree upeksha kar raha hai
jab inake paas itana dhan hai to phir mere gahane kyon nahin banavaate jisase ham sabase adhik sneh rakhate hain usee par sabase adhik rosh bhee karate hain
jaalapa ko sabase adhik krodh ramaanaath par tha
agar yah apane maatapita se jor dekar kahate to koee inakee baat na taal sakata par yah kuchh kahen bhee inake munh mein to dahee jama hua hai
mujhase prem hota to yon nishchint na baithe rahate
jab tak saaree cheezen na banava lete raat ko neend na aatee
munh dekhe kee muhabbat hai maanbaap se kaise kahen jaenge to apanee hee or main kaun hoon vah rama se keval khinchee hee na rahatee thee vah kabhee kuchh poochhata to dochaar jaleekatee suna detee
bechaara apanasa munh lekar rah jaata gareeb apanee hee lagaee huee aag mein jala jaata tha
agar vah jaanata ki un deengon ka yah phal hoga to vah jabaan par muhar laga leta
chinta aur glaani usake hraday ko kuchale daalatee thee
kahaan subah se shaam tak hanseekahakahe sairsapaate mein katate the kahaan ab naukaree kee talaash mein thokaren khaata phirata tha
saaree mastee gaayab ho gaee
baarbaar apane pita par krodh aata yah chaahate to dochaar maheene mein sab roopaye ada ho jaate magar inhen kya phikr main chaahe mar jaoon par yah apanee tek na chhodenge
usake prem se bhare hue nishkapat hraday mein aagsee sulagatee rahatee thee
jaalapa ka murajhaaya hua mukh dekhakar usake munh se thandee saans nikal jaatee thee

vah sukhad premsvapn itanee jald bhang ho gaya kya ve din phir kabhee aaenge teen hazaar ke gahane kaise banenge agar naukar bhee hua to aisa kaunsa bada ohada mil jaega teen hazaar to shaayad teen janm mein bhee na jama hon
vah koee aisa upaay soch nikaalana chaahata tha jisamen vah jaldse jald atul sampatti ka svaamee ho jaay
kaheen usake naam koee laataree nikal aatee phir to vah jaalapa ko aabhooshanon se madh deta
sabase pahale chandrahaar banavaata
usamen heere jade hote
agar is vakt use jaalee not banaana aa jaata to avashy banaakar chala deta
ek din vah shaam tak naukaree kee talaash mein maaramaara phirata raha
